name: KISS Car Jam
description:
KISS CAR JAM!

Published by KISSFMUK & Studio Liddell.

Hit the road with Rickie, Melvin and Charlie from KISS FM UK’s Breakfast Show!

Pick from three cars, choose your driver and make sure you’re strapped in tight. Dodge Melvin’s chickens, Rickie’s precious leather jacket and Charlie’s favourite headphones, and rack up the points!

Be the best driver, get the highest score and share it with your mates!
